channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Okay. I decided I should learn to code properly today. (Not properly...properly for someone who doesen't know how to code, if you know what I mean.)
I took a blank 317 source and a client.
Whenever I click the "Equipment" tab in the client I disconnect and get this error:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64992 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:214) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270) at client.method105(client.java:8125) at client.method36(client.java:1601) at client.method102(client.java:7848) at client.method9(client.java:8705) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4487) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:680) [/code]
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Thats a good point actually as I logged in with a different client and he appeared to be wearing a “null” item. Let me check server sided what the spawn gear is…

I also got this error when I did ::master. Maybe its time to switch source.

[code]Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10704
at Class8.method198(Class8.java:214)
at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270)
at client.method105(client.java:8125)
at client.method36(client.java:1601)
at client.method102(client.java:7848)
at client.method9(client.java:8705)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126)
at client.run(client.java:4487)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:680)

[/code]

Read full topic
